text: The men's 200 metres event at the 2003 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Bydgoszcz, Poland, at Zawisza Stadion on 18 and 20 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Chris Lambert ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Marcin Jędrusiński ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Johan Wissman ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 20 July Wind: 0.7m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
